General.Name: Prairie Operating Co. Common Stock
General.Description: Prairie Operating Co., an independent energy company, engages in the acquisition, development, and production of crude oil, natural gas, and natural gas liquids in the United States. It holds assets primarily in the Denver-Julesburg Basin in Colorado. The company is based in Houston, Texas.
General.Address: 55 Waugh Drive, Houston, TX, United States, 77007
